pr_title: [SegmentV2] Optimize the upgrade logic of SegmentV2

timeline.bodyText: If the storage format is already V2,  will Doris forbidden the schema change job
timeline.author: EmmyMiao87

replies.bodyText: Yes, if storage format is already V2, needAlter will remain false, and nothing will be done.
replies.author: morningman

timeline.bodyText: If user set 'use v2 rollup', the best rollup will not be selected?
timeline.author: EmmyMiao87

replies.bodyText: Yes, if 'use v2 rollup' is true, only base index will be selected
replies.author: morningman

timeline.bodyText: Maybe We should check the candidate index firstly and choose the best rollup in priorities.
timeline.author: EmmyMiao87
